name: Kasumi Rebirth
description: Kasumi Rebirth is a clickable “touching” simulation game which consists of Flash animation. It is very simple to play. You can enjoy seeing her various reactions by clicking or dragging cursor after placing on the part where you want to touch. For example, when you want to lift up her clothes, drag lapel to the direction you want to turn it over. When you want to squeeze the breasts, grab and turn it round and round. Elaborately created the simple, direct operation. No irritating game rule is featured here. Feel free to enjoy the another version of Kasumi rebirth by Sawatex.
